General.Name: JSW Pacific
General.Description: JSW Pacific Corporation manufactures and sells wireless connectivity products in Taiwan. The company offers IP cameras, such as IP cameras, outdoor tube cameras, indoor PT cameras, outdoor PT cameras, WIFI battery cameras, and intelligence AI cameras; video doorbells; security lighting cameras; security home control products; and smart locks. It also provides hardware and software development services. JSW Pacific Corporation was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 700 Zhongzheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan

3.Name: Wan Yu  Xu
3.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. of Marketing Division and Director
